msg.msgText: The configuration of composite objects that control messaging services, such as Message Hub, Endpoint, Policies, MQ Connectivity etc., can be deleted using the "delete" option of the "imaserver" command. SYNTAX: imaserver delete help imaserver delete object_type "Name=value" [delete options in "OptionType=value" pairs] EXAMPLES: imaserver delete Endpoint "Name=TestEP" imaserver delete Queue "Name=TestQueue" "DiscardMessages=true" imaserver delete MQTTClient "Name=TestClient" imaserver delete TrustedCertificate "TrustedCertificate=trustCert.pem" "SecurityProfileName=secProfile1" imaserver delete Subscription "SubName=sub1" "ClientID=clientid1"

msgExplanation.p: This message is the text of a command or an object help.
